name:
Metroid Prime™: Federation
Force Blast Ball Update
formal_name:
Metroid Prime™: Federation Force
Blast Ball Update Version 1.1.0
description: This is an update for the Metroid Prime™: Federation Force Blast Ball Demo game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of  Metroid Prime™: Federation Force Blast Ball Demo.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
